posts.post_content:
Posted By: Doug Moore
I have the following T 206 cards for sale, prices include shipping and insurance.
All are priced to move quickly.
First to send an e-mail with commitment gets the card. I will have scans available later on tonight.

Schulte Front View PSA 4 No creases nice color. 130.00
Lundgren Cubs PSA 3 No creases nice centering and color 250.00
Jimmy Collins SGC 40 El Principe No creases nice color  150.00
Geyer PSA 4 Beautiful card Tolstoi  75.00
Walsh PSA 3 No creases niocely centered and nice registration 110.00

Please e-mail me at ddm4236@comcasat.net with interest of any questions.

Thanks all!
